title: I keep dc-ing, but it's not my wifi or my computer's fault. Please help me! Please read!
body:
I play league quite often, but this problem just occurred (on 7/19/16) when I was starting a game. I finish champ select and go into the loading screen and tab out to finish watching a youtube video (there's only a minute left, so I just decided to finish it). I exit out of the page, and try to alt tab back into the loading screen, but everything turns black.. I wait a bit and tab out again, to a notification saying my internet isn't working, and that I need to retry again *LATER*! Later?? What? With this new /remake, I can't just wait until LATER? I check my internet, and everything is in working condition. My family members have no problem with the wifi, but I ask them to disconnect it, just to see if they're bogging it down.
It doesn't work.
I eventually go to my task manager and quit League, to see if i can boot it up and just log in and join my team.
I finally log in and load up, but the game has already ended. There was /remake, and I didn't have a chance to explain what happened. After this happening for another time, I've been placed into a lower Q priority. I still try to get into a game, but now, when I load up after champ select, the screen goes black, _even without me tabbing out_. It BugSplats every time!!! Again, I quit League, sign into my account, and try to load the game to find another 5 or so people have reported me.

What do I do? I really want to play, but I'm so tired of waiting 20 minutes to get into a game, _and then not even playing it!_ My computer is brand new, with everything updated, so there's no problems there. I'm lost and honestly extremely frustrated.

HELP!!!

replies.body:
I can definitely see how frustrating this can be, especially on a brand new computer. Just because you're having issues doesn't mean there's something inherently wrong with your computer, but there's clearly something causing these issues that needs to be addressed. Bugsplats are generally caused by problems with your local Windows configurations or your installation of League. Our [Bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) goes over the most common solutions and is a good first layer of troubleshooting for this issue. 

Let me know if the guide helped you out.

BugSplat has definitely happened, but most of the time, I DC right after champ select. I go up to the champion loading screen, then boom, screen goes black and I can't reconnect.. I've read other threads about  this happening to other players in this patch. They have the same problem and have not found a solution. **I'm on the verge of tears writing this..** I just want to play with my friends again. I managed to get a few games in at my local university, but waiting that 20 minute penalty is *awful*. I actually played my last penalty today, but my computer did the same thing, and I DC-ed again..Another 5 game 20 minute penalty it is.
Is there anyway you can get rid of my penalties and my DC-ing? I really did cry about this a ton.
Please, and thank you.

You can take steps towards resolving your issue by working through the steps in the [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) I linked earlier. While there are a number of reasons why you may be having issues, the guide goes over the most common solutions. 

Penalties can only be removed by playing through them. A disconnection from a match negatively impacts everyone in the match, regardless if the disconnection was intentional or not. This is one of the reasons why all disconnections area treated equally by the [Leaverbuster System.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

If you still have issues after working through the guide I linked, please let me know.
